---

## Checklist

Before submitting, please ensure:

- [ ] Research question clearly stated
- [ ] Methodology documented (replicable where possible)
- [ ] Findings clearly presented
- [ ] Implications for AgentOps explicit
- [ ] Prior work cited appropriately
- [ ] Ethical considerations addressed
- [ ] Level of access specified (open/proprietary)
- [ ] Format appropriate for target audience

---

**Thank you for contributing research to strengthen the theoretical foundations of AgentOps!**

**Note:** Research contributions are reviewed for relevance, rigor, and applicability. Peer-reviewed work is preferred but not required. Preprints and technical reports are welcome.
